properties.entry:
SELECT MEM_NO , GAME_NO , GAME_IMG , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , GAME_INTRO , PRICE , POINT , MEM_NICK
FROM WISHLIST JOIN GAME USING(GAME_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND GAME_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( MEM_NO , GAME_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND GAME_NO = ?
